Chinwe Okoro (amụrụ 20 June 1989) bụ onye na-eme egwuregwu nke track na field nke Naijiria Sonyere na asọm mpi shot put na discus
Ọ bụ onye nwetara mmeri ugboro atọ nke Afirikan champion ma jide ndekọ ọganihu na mmeri nke Naijiria  maka  otutu discus atụrụ na mita iri ise na iteghete na iri asaa na iteghete.
Okoro tolitere na Kentucky, ma gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Russell, ma nwee ikike abụọ ịbụ nwa amaala Naijiria na Amerika
Ọ gara Mahadum Louisville wee jikọta egwuregwu na agụmakwụkwọ dị ka nwa akwụkwọ-bụ onye egwuregwu
Ọ meriri aha obere ndị America na ọtụtụ shọt putu etinyere na 2008 wee bụrụ onye NCAA na All-American na 2011

Ọkwa ya dị elu na ọmụmụ ọgwụgwọ anụ ahụ ya mere ka ọ bụrụ nnukwu ụlọ akwụkwọ Big East Conference All-Academic ugboro ise, ma mesịa nweta akwụkwọ mmụta Michael Hale ka ọ gaa n'ihu na ọmụmụ ya site na doctorate na Mahadum Bellarmine
Asọmpi mba ụwa mbụ ya bịara na 2008 World Junior Championships na egwuregwu ọsọ, ebe ọ tụchara nke iri na shọt putu
Ihe nrite izizi ya nke mbụ sochiri n'asọmpị asọmpi Afrịka nke afọ 2012, bụ ebe o meriri n'asọmpi discus wee bụrụ onye sochiri Vivian Chukwuemeka na Shot put mmeri nke nchịkọta medalu nke ndị Naijiria
E mechara chụpụ Chukwuemeka maka iji ọgwụ eme ihe, mana o buliri Okoro ka ọ bụrụ mmeri okpukpu abụọ na mmemme ahụ

Okoro tụfuru oge 2013 mana ọ lọghachiri nke ọma n'afọ gara aga wee gbachitere aha mkparịta ụka ya nke ọma na asọmpi asọmpi Afrịka nke 2014 site na ndekọ asọmpi na ihe kacha mma nke onwe ya na ọtụtụ iri ise na iteghete na uma iri asaa na iteghete
Ọ gbagoro , ebe o sochiriAuriol Dongmo Mekemnang nke Cameroon bụ onye mmeri ụmụnwaanyị n'oge ahụ

Ọ nọchitere anya Africa na ihe omume abụọ bụ ihe omume ọtụtụ ihe na 2014 IAAF Continental Cup, nke emere otu ọnwa ka e mesịrị n'otu ebe ahụ na Marrakesh, ma bụrụ nke isii na shọt put na nke asaa na discus
Okoro tozuru oke maka asọmpi Rio 2016 site n'itinye ọtụtụ okwe iri isii na otu ụma iri ise na asato
Ọ nọchitere anya Naịjirịa n'asọmpi discus wee gbaọ nke iri na anọ n'ime iri atọ na anọ.
